snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include professional athletes versus giant ducks, privacy advice to companies from the A.C.L.U. and an analysis of...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include professional athletes versus giant ducks, privacy advice to companies from the A.C.L.U. and an analysis of Amazon's push to introduce another virtual currency.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Vine Restriction, and Amazon 'Money'
